title: Shionmachi's art gallary
content:

[[div id="myDiv" style="background-color: orchid; text-color:white;"]]
[[size 1.5em]]Shionmachi Basic Info File[[/size]]
[[/div]]
[[div id="myDiv" style="background-color: orchid; text-color:white;"]]
Name: Shionmachi  (not actual name)                      
   codename: SHION 
   Shionmachi resembles a typical human skull with pale white hair. His entire body is made up of recycled skeletal bones from either an animal or a human being. He frequently naps during the day and is busy at night; he can be found eating food or reading pocket books anywhere in the facility. Shionmachi doesn't typically chew his food while he eats, so it is uncertain how he consumes and digests his meals. [[/div]]
   
[[include component:image-block
| name=Shion.png
| caption=cosplaying
| width=WIDTH-GOES-HERE
| align=center]]

 
>
> "What you havent seen a talking skeleton before? I thought we been through that." 

 [[div id="myDiv" style="background-color: orchid; text-color:white;"]]
Greetings, this is Shionmachi's official art gallary. Here, you can see my artworks, sketches and WIPS. I mostly do art of my characters and the articles I make. I am willing to also do fanarts as well. I don't consider myself as a master artist but I love to share my work for everyone to see.[[/div]]  
------
